1: <pb/>Re' Adán rajaaw i Set, re' Set rajaaw i Enós.
2: Re' Enós rajaaw i Cainán, re' i Cainán rajaaw i Mahalaleel rajaaw Jared.
3: Re' Jared rajaaw i Enoc, re' Enoc rajaaw i Matusalén, re' Matusalén rajaaw i Lamec, re' Lameac rajaaw i Noé.
4: <pb/>Re' Noé je' wili i kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Sem, Cam, Jafet.
5: <pb/>Re' Jafet je' wili i kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javán, Tubal, Mesec, Tiras.
6: Re' Gomer je' wili i kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Askenaz, Rifat, Togarma.
7: Re' Javán je' wili kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Elisa, Tarsis, Quitim, Dodanim.
8: <pb/>Re' Cam je' wili i kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Cus, Mizraim, Fut, Canaán.
9: Re' Cus je' wili i kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Seba, Havila, Sabta, Raama, Sabteca. Re' i Raama je' wili kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Seba, Dedán.
10: Re' Cus rajaaw i Nimrod re' i peet xwihik rajaawriik chupaam i ye'aab' re' re'.
11: Re' i Mizraim, rumaam rati't taqe aj Ludim, taqe i aj Anamim, taqe aj Lehabim, taqe i aj Naftuhim.
12: Je' wo' taqe i aj Patrusim, taqe i aj Casluhim. Re' i Patrusim, i Casluhim re' taqe re' i kimaam kati't aj filisteo, je' wo' taqe i aj Caftoreos.
13: Re' i Canaán re' i rajaaw i Sidón i peet rak'uun, eh re' i Het.
14: Re' i Canaán rumaam rati't taqe i aj jebuseo, taqe i aj amorreo, taqe i aj gergeseo.
15: Je' wo' taqe i aj heveo, taqe i aj araceo,
16: taqe i aj arvadeo, taqe i aj zemareo, taqe i aj hamateo.
17: <pb/>Re' taqe i rak'uun i Sem, je' wili kib'ihnaal: Elam, Asur, Arfaxad, Lud, Aram. Re' taqe rak'uun i Aram je' wili i kib'ihnaal: Uz, Hul, Geter, Masec.
18: Re' Arfaxad rajaaw i Sela. Re' i Sela rajaaw i Heber.
19: Re' Heber kiib' i rak'uun xwihik, re' peet rak'uun Peleg i rub'ihnaal ruum chupaam i ruq'ijil i reh xkich'aqib'eej kiib' i k'achareel wach ak'al. Re' rak'uun jinaj chik i Joctán.
20: Re' Joctán rajaaw i Almodad, i Selef, i Hazar-mavet i Jera,
21: i Adoram, i Uzal, i Dicla,
22: i Ebal, i Abimael, i Seba,
23: i Ofir, i Havila, i Jobab, chu'nchel i re' rak'uun i Joctán.
24: <pb/>Re' Sem rajaaw i Arfaxad, re' Arfaxad rajaaw i Sela.
25: Eh re' Sela rajaaw i Heber, re' i Heber rajaaw i Peleg, re' i rajaaw i Reu.
26: Re' Reu rajaaw i Serug, re' Serug rajaaw i Nacor, re' i rajaaw i Taré.
27: Re' Taré rajaaw i Abram, eh Abraham wo' inkiq'or reh.
28: <pb/>Re' Abraham, Isaac, Ismael kib'ihnaal i rak'uun.
29: Re' Abraham je' wili kib'ihnaal i riih rumaam: Nebaiot i peet rak'uun, Ismael, re' Cedar Adbeel, Mibsam.
31: Re' Jetur, Nofis, i Cedema chu'nchel i re' rak'uun taqe i Ismael.
32: <pb/>Re' i Cetura rukab'ruxoqil i Abraham, je' wili kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Zimram, Jocsán, Medán, Madián, Isbac, Súa. Re' i Jocsán Seba, Dedán kib'ihnaal i rak'uun.
33: Re' Madián je' wili i kib'ihnaal i rak'uun, Efa, Efer, Hanoc, Abida, Elda. Chu'nchel i re' riih rumaam i Cetura.
34: <pb/>Re' Abraham rajaaw Isaac. Re' Isaac kajaaw Esaú, i Israel, Jacob wo' inkiq'or reh.
35: Re' Esaú je' wili kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Elifaz, Reuel, Jeús, Jaalam, Coré.
36: Re' i Elifaz je' wili i kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Temán, Omar, Zefo, Gatam, Cenaz, eh re' i Amalec re' i xwihik ruuk' i Timna rukab'ruxoqil.
37: Re' Reuel je' wili i kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Nahat, Zera, Sama, Mizá.
38: <pb/>Re' Seir je' wili kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Lotán, Sobal, Zibeón, Aná, Disón, Ezer, Disán.
39: Re' Lotán je' wili kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Hori, Homam. Re' i Timna ranaab' i Lotán.
40: Re' Sobal je' wili kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Alván, Manahat, Ebal, Sefo, Onam. Re' taqe rak'uun i Zibeón, re' Aja, re' Aná.
41: Re' Aná rajaaw i Disón. Re' Disón je' wili kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Amram, Esbán, Itrán, Querán.
42: Re' Ezer je' wili kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Bilhán, Zaaván, Jaacán. Re' taqe rak'uun i Disán, re' Uz, re' i Arán.
43: <pb/>Re' i reey xi wihik chi taaq'anik Edom noq komajaa' chih kireey i aj Israel, je' wili kib'ihnaal: Re' peet re' Bela rak'uun i Beor aj pan tinamit Dinaba.
44: Noq xkimik reje i Bela re' chik i Jobab rak'uun i Zera xkahnik chi reyil chi jilow, aj pan tinamit Bosra.
45: Noq xkimik reje i Jobab, re' chik i Husam xkahnik chi reyil chi jilow, aj panruyuq'ul i Temán.
46: Noq xkimik reje i Husam re' chik i Hadad rak'uun i Bedad xkahnik chi reyil chi jilow. Re' Hadad re' i xb'anik keh i aj Madián chupaam i ye'aab' Moab aj pan tinamit Avit.
47: Noq xkimik reje i Hadad re' chik i Samla xkahnik chi reyil chi jilow aj pan tinamit Masreca.
48: Noq xkimik reje i Samla re' chik i Saúl xkahnik chi reyil chi jilow aj pan tinamit Rehobot wilik chi chii' i nim ha' Éufrates.
49: Noq xkimik reje i Saúl, re' chik i Baal-hanán i rak'uun i Acbor xkahnik chi reyil chi jilow.
50: Noq xkimik reje i Baal-hanán re' chik i Hadad xkahnik chi reyil chi jilow, aj pan tinamit Poi. Re' i rehk'een i Hadad Mehetabel i rub'ihnaal rixq'uun i Matred, eh riih i Mezaab.
51: <pb/>Noq xkimik reje i Hadad re' taqe i k'amal kib'eeh i aj Edom je' wili i kib'ihnaal: Timna, Alva, Jetet.
54: Magdiel, Iram. Chu'nchel i re' xi wihik chi k'amal kib'eeh i aj Edom.
